caption: Respond to a property possession claim
heading: Payments or agreements since the claim was made
paragraph1: You will now be asked questions about any payments or agreements you’ve made since Treetop Housing made their claim.
paragraph2: This will help a judge understand:
paragraph3: The claimant will be able to see your answers.
paragraph4: If you’ve paid some or all of the money you owe, you should bring proof of this to the hearing.
bullet1: If any arrangements have already been made to pay off the money you owe in rent payments (rent arrears)
bullet2: If you’ve paid some or all of the money you owe
